task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the Multiplication feature of the JPS Calculator.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully multiply numbers, you must know what is multiplication or product of numbers.

result.p: The result from the multiplication is displayed.

You want to multiply 5 with 3. The equation will look like 5x3=15. For this, first you enter 5. Press multiply button. Then you enter 3. Now press the equals button. The result 15 appears on the screen.
